thread.title: LifePoint meets 1Q profit forecasts - Yahoo Singapore Finance
thread.title_full: LifePoint meets 1Q profit forecasts - Yahoo Singapore Finance

author: Associated Press
title: LifePoint meets 1Q profit forecasts - Yahoo Singapore Finance
text:
BRENTWOOD, Tenn. (AP) _ LifePoint Hospitals Inc. (LPNT) on Friday reported first-quarter net income of $38.9 million. 
The Brentwood, Tennessee-based company said it had net income of 84 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for asset impairment costs, came to $1 per share. 
The results met Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 15 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of $1 per share. 
The rural hospital operator posted revenue of $1.26 billion in the period, beating Street forecasts. Ten analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.24 billion. 
LifePoint shares have risen 4 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has risen 34 percent in the last 12 months.
